events.name: Delmonico's Bookstore Inauguration
events.description: Join the celebration for inaugurating one of the biggest bookstores of the city.

events.name: Local Dev Group Meetup
events.description: Meet and connect with the best developers out there.

events.name: Prof. Gillian's Birthday Party.
events.description: Join us in celebrating Professor Gillian's birthday party at 24 Park Avenue.

events.name: Awesone Japanese Desserts
events.description: Japanese Food Hub is organizing a food fest, showcasing the best of the desserts. Come join them.

comments.content: This event is going to be awesome, looking forward to it!
Can't wait to meet professon gillian. Can't believe he is going to be 60 this year!
Was looking forward to this bookstore since a long time!
